short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Organize your tabs with this extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of having a cluttered tab bar in your browser? Say hello to Tab Organizer â€“ the perfect tool to streamline and declutter your open tabs in Google Chrome. With Tab Organizer, you can effortlessly find, group, sort, and close tabs based on your unique requirements.

Key Features:

Select Tabs with Ease: The "Select Tabs" feature allows you to effortlessly choose multiple tabs, making it a breeze to organize them according to your preference.

Streamlined Tab Deletion: The "Delete Selected Tabs" function simplifies the process of closing tabs in bulk, helping you maintain a tidy workspace.

Search and Sort: Easily find specific tabs by searching for keywords. Plus, with the ability to sort your tabs, you can enjoy a well-organized browsing experience.

Group by Domain: Tab Organizer intuitively groups tabs by domain, helping you quickly locate and manage related content.

Most Visited Highlight: Identify your most visited websites within the past week, making it convenient to prioritize your frequently accessed pages.

Tab Organizer is the ideal companion for anyone seeking an enhanced tab management experience in Google Chrome. Take control of your browsing and keep your digital workspace tidy with ease.

Privacy Assurance: Our extension does not collect or transmit any user data. Your browsing activity remains private.
